data.text: @TaiwanNews886 Blimey - visitations just in time for 清明～

@TaiwanNews886 #Taiwan will continue this excruciatingly slow slide back to sanity. Then, amazingly, several months before local elections, all/most restrictions will be dropped and the bureaucrats will take responsibility for protecting you the last two years.
@TaiwanNews886 What a nothing burger. Masks off outdoors already. 🤷‍♂️ Taiwan has to be the most cautious country in the world.
@TaiwanNews886 I say it is all wrong 'relax' for covid

@TaiwanNews886 When the pandemic was at it's peak in 2020, outdoor masks were optional and they called it Level 2. What the hell level are we on now? Or should we all be excited that nothing has really changed except we can dine on high speed trains?
@TaiwanNews886 10 days? Cmon follow Singapore. VTL! Bring a boost to the local economy!

@TaiwanNews886 It’s a joke. Can anyone explain me why you have to keep mask on giving lecture in a classroom and at the same time you can dine in restaurant where everyone is talking and particles just flying around? Please, give me explanation.
